text: Stara Bystrzyca () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Stara Bystrzyca
title: Stara Bystrzyca
